Brainhack Halifax 2023

Halifax, NS, Canada

December 8-11, 2023


Join Brainhack on Mattermost Submit a Project

Share

Show your research to other neuroimaging researchers.

Gain Skills

Learn how to apply the latest computational tools to your data.

Get Involved

Find exciting projects that you would like to contribute to.

Network

Meet researchers from a variety of backgrounds.

Registration Brainhack Halifax 2023 will open soon!

Brainhack Halifax 2023 is a local hub of Brainhack Global 2023. The goal of the hackathon is to bring together researchers with disparate backgrounds to collaborate on open science projects in neuroimaging.

Dates: December 8-11, 2023

Costs: 30$ - Breakfast and lunch will be provided.

Location: Halifax, NS, Canada

Participants are encouraged to post project ideas to https://brainhack.org/global2023/projects/

Please join the Brainhack Mattermost for updated information on the developing Hackathon content and to contribute your own ideas.
